item.title: Two-Year Old Gopher
item.description: A Two-Year Go Language User I started learning Go language in October 2022, and now it has been two years. During this time, I have gained a certain level of understanding of Go and have had some practical experience using it in my work. I’d like to share some of my thoughts on Go. Why Learn Go? I was choosing a technology that would help me establish myself in Chinaâ€™s internet industry.
